description:
After the time skip, Suzuya Juuzou rises further in the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG]`s ranks and becomes leader of http://anidb.net/ch95743 [his own squad], having matured more thanks to http://anidb.net/ch69927 [Shinohara] and become a responsible, if eccentric, adult. He is promoted to Special Class at the age of 22, the first to reach the rank that young since http://anidb.net/ch70038 [Arima].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Suzuya Juuzou
